ygData.subject: RE: Genni?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bah, it s about 81 pounds.  You can run with it just fine. With Accelerando and a drum, you ll probably still be faster than SoW unencumbered (with a MM
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 26 Oct 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> Heheh - dearest sister - I don't care if you twist chant, anthem, warsong
> and selo's - with 3210gp you would NOT be able to walk to the door much
> less run to somewhere in Rathe Mts - not even with a MM drum. But I am sure
> someone will try! <g>

Bah, it's about 81 pounds. You can run with it just fine.
With Accelerando and a drum, you'll probably still be faster
than SoW unencumbered (with a MM drum you definitely will be).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
